title: 1.12scoreboard
author: t1546542
txt_content:
本帖最后由 t1546542 于 2020-3-6 16:05 编辑 

版本:1.12.2
判断所有的在线玩家的uid分数
如果没有一个在线玩家的uid分数为0
让所有人say 233并重置所有人的uid分数
@Chelove_C60 @Jokey_钥匙 @SPGoding @⊙u⊙

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
/scoreboard players tag @a[score_uid_min=0,score_uid=0] add 0
/execute @a[tag=0] ~ ~ ~ scoreboard players tag @a add 0
/execute @a[tag=!0] ~ ~ ~ say 233
/execute @a[tag=!0] ~ ~ ~ scoreboard players reset @s uid

replies.author: Chelover_C60
replies.txt_content:
function test unless @a[score_uid=0,score_uid_min=0]

test.mcfunction
execute @a ~ ~ ~ say 233
scoreboard plaayers reset @a uid复制代码
